speaker: ROBERT TORRENCE
line: Get away! Shoo! Get away, shoo! R.B.P. field base, come in. Field base, come in, please. This is Doctor Robert Torrence with the biodiversity project... requesting immediate evacuation from Sector Z-one-five. This is a medical emergency. Please respond. I repeat... Doctor Robert Torrence... biodiversity project. Immediate evacuation from Sector Z-one-five.

speaker: MAN #1
line: Espera momento.

speaker: WINSTON
line: Hey, Bobby? You got some mail.

speaker: BOBBY TORRENCE
line: Don't waste my time, Winston, both of us know I ain't got nobody.

speaker: WINSTON
line: Could be those baptists from Annandale. I hear they been sending fruitcake.

speaker: BOBBY TORRENCE
line: Hey, Winston! You think this is funny? What kind of crap you trying to pull here? Get this thing out of my crib! Winston! Winston! Winston!

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: When was he exposed?

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: Eighteen hours ago.

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: I've never heard of anything incubating so quickly.

speaker: BOBBY TORRENCE
line: Where's the prison doc? I want to see the prison doc...

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: We're specialists, Mister Torrence.

speaker: BOBBY TORRENCE
line: What's wrong with me?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Five centimeters. They appear fairly uniform.

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: Basal temperature?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: One-o-three point five. Oxygen saturation... eighty-one percent.

speaker: BOBBY TORRENCE
line: Sssss, what's wrong with me?

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: Try and relax, Mister Torrence. We're here to help you.

speaker: WINSTON
line: Put the sheets in the cart. Make sure you get all them pillows too. I'll be back in five minutes.

speaker: PAUL
line: We'll be here. See that? He couldn't clear out of here fast enough.

speaker: STEVE
line: The whole cell block's empty.

speaker: PAUL
line: Yeah, McGuire says they're full up at the infirmary. Bringing in more beds.

speaker: STEVE
line: Yeah, well... there's probably something going around.

speaker: PAUL
line: Maybe.

speaker: STEVE
line: Why? Do you know something?

speaker: PAUL
line: I know the sheets ain't going to the laundry. McGuire says they're going to some kind of incinerator.

speaker: STEVE
line: But the laundry pick-up's still happening?

speaker: SCULLY
line: According to my briefing, the prisoners escaped by hiding in a laundry cart.

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't think the guards are watching enough prison movies.

speaker: SCULLY
line: And they're both serving life terms. Murder convictions.

speaker: GUARD
line: Everybody's here.

speaker: MULDER
line: I thought this was about escaped prisoners.

speaker: SCULLY
line: It is.

speaker: MULDER
line: Then who are the men in the funny suits?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don't know. Looks like some kind of de-con situation.

speaker: TAPIA
line: F.B.I. run out of crooked politicians to sting?

speaker: MULDER
line: Excuse me?

speaker: TAPIA
line: Mulder and, uh, Scully?

speaker: SCULLY
line: That's right. We have orders to work with the federal marshals on this manhunt.

speaker: TAPIA
line: Either of you two ever run an escaped convict operation?

speaker: MULDER
line: No.

speaker: TAPIA
line: Well, then you'd be a real big help if you just try to stay out of the way.

speaker: MULDER
line: Oh, we'd be happy to as soon as we can talk to someone in charge.

speaker: TAPIA
line: I'm in charge here.

speaker: MULDER
line: Apparently not or you'd know why our involvement was requested.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We don't know why we've been sent here. Maybe if we talked to the warden or someone...

speaker: TAPIA
line: Well, no one's here. The prison's been taken over by the national guard. They closed off most of the facility.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why?

speaker: TAPIA
line: I don't know why. The federal marshal's business isn't in here, it's out there, trying to catch those two convicts.

speaker: MULDER
line: Where did this case originate, Scully?

speaker: SCULLY
line: It came out of Skinner's office.

speaker: MULDER
line: Did he say why he gave it to us?

speaker: SCULLY
line: No, why?

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, this isn't the type of thing the F.B.I. normally gets called in on. I got a feeling we're not being told the entire story here.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I've got the same feeling, Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: Do you think you could get in there and find out what's going on?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I can try. Where are you going?

speaker: MULDER
line: To see if I can get in the way.

speaker: MAN
line: Hey, you girls go with Mom. See you in a few minutes.

speaker: WOMAN
line: Robert? Robert? Robert! Robert! Robert, hey!

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: I'm sorry, this is a restricted area.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Who are you?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Doctor Osbourne.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Are you the prison doctor?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: No.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Who do you work for?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: The C.D.C.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You work for the Centers for Disease Control? What are you doing here? Sir! I'm a medical doctor. I want to know what's going on here. Sir, if you don't let me in, a lot of people in Washington are going to find out that you're conducting a secret quarantine in here.

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: I'm under strict orders.

speaker: SCULLY
line: So am I.

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: All I can tell you is that there is a flu-like illness spreading among some of the prisoners.

speaker: SCULLY
line: How many people are infected?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Fourteen men so far.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Any deaths?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Ten of the fourteen.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What are the chances the men who escaped are infected?

speaker: MULDER
line: Mulder.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, it's me. I'm starting to get a picture of what's going on here.

speaker: MULDER
line: What did you find?

speaker: SCULLY
line: There seems to be some kind of......deadly contagion sweeping the lockdown population.

speaker: MULDER
line: Deadly? How deadly?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, from what I've seen so far, thirty-six hours after infection, deadly.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, is there a chance any of the escaped men were infected?

speaker: SCULLY
line: The exact nature of this thing......or how it is spread is unclear. So is their exposure to it and any danger they might pose.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'd say these guys are a danger in any event. Call me as soon as you know anything.

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: I don't care who you are or what your business is, I want you out of here right now.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Not until I get some answers.

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: You're in violation of federal statutes.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm a federal agent, sir.

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: Who were you on the phone to?

speaker: SCULLY
line: To my partner, who needs to know if the men he's pursuing are infected.

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: That information is unavailable.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, then I want to see charts and I want access to the infirmary.

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: You see what I let you see.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: Hello?

speaker: PAUL
line: I'm free, baby.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: Paul?

speaker: PAUL
line: Listen, I'm gonna...

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: Where are you?

speaker: PAUL
line: I'm coming home.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: What are you talking about?

speaker: PAUL
line: I'm coming to get you.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: What? What?

speaker: ANGELO GARZA
line: Yo! Anybody in here? Hello? Hey, man... you okay? You look messed up!

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: You can't be down here!

speaker: SCULLY
line: I need to know what these men are dying from. You said this was some kind of flu-like illness. What are these?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Please! Please! These bodies should not be exposed.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Do all of the victims have these boils? You're burning the bodies, why? Doctor Osbourne, wait!

speaker: MAN
line: Freeze! Hands in the air! Freeze! Freeze! Clear.

speaker: MULDER
line: We've got a man down! He's alive. The attendant's name is Angelo Garza. He took a nice crack to the head but he's talking.

speaker: TAPIA
line: Yeah, well, he's lucky they didn't kill him.

speaker: MULDER
line: Kid's got a lot of hair, probably absorbed the blow. He found one of the men in pain on the bathroom floor with a large boil on his face. There's a contagion at the prison, these men could be infected.

speaker: TAPIA
line: Get on the horn, see what anybody knows about that. All right, they took the kid's keys, they got in the safe. They got money, the kid's car, possibly a firearm and they got a big head start.

speaker: MULDER
line: Any idea where they're headed?

speaker: TAPIA
line: There are twenty-three possible roads and thoroughfares.

speaker: MULDER
line: Either of these guys got a girlfriend, you know?

speaker: TAPIA
line: I wish I could tell you but those records are locked up in the prison. Unless we can access them, this is Smokey and the Bandit.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, if they had girlfriends, they'd probably try to call them. You think of that?

speaker: OPERATOR
line: Bell Atlantic Operator, how may I help you?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm a federal agent assisting in a manhunt for two escaped prisoners. My badge number is J-T-T-o-four-seven-one-o-one-one-one-one. I need to know the last call made from this booth.

speaker: OPERATOR
line: All right, sir...

speaker: MULDER
line: Can you repeat that, please? All right, thank you.

speaker: TAPIA
line: What's going on here? Hey, what are you guys doing here? What the hell is going on here? Who authorized this? Hey!

speaker: MULDER
line: What's going on here, what's going on?

speaker: ANGELO GARZA
line: Where are they taking me? Help!

speaker: MULDER
line: Who are you?

speaker: TAPIA
line: Hey! Did you order this?

speaker: MULDER
line: No!

speaker: TAPIA
line: Then who the hell did?

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't know, but there was a call made from that phone booth about two hours bago. I got an address and phone number from Dinwittie County. "925 August St. 555-6936")

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: Wait here, sweetie. Be right back. I thought you were B.S.ing me!

speaker: PAUL
line: I'm gone, sweet thing! They ain't never taking me back.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: I ain't going to let them.

speaker: BOY
line: Mommy! Mommy!

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: I'm coming, sweetie! Daddy's home. Come on.

speaker: PAUL
line: I got somebody with me.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: What? What's wrong with him?

speaker: PAUL
line: I don't know. He's out of it.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: Oh, hell, he's burning up.

speaker: PAUL
line: We got to get him in the house.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yes, I'm trying to trace the origin of a package that was sent to Robert Torrence at the Cumberland State Correctional Facilit in Virginia. Y, yeah. The packaging number is D-D-P-one-one-two-one-four-eight. Sure, I'll hold. Yeah. The package was sent from Wichita, Kansas? Did you record the name of the sender? Could you check that again, please? Thank you.

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What do you know about Pinck Pharmaceuticals?

speaker: MULDER
line: Uh, it's one of, if not the biggest manufacturer of drugs in America. Why?

speaker: SCULLY
line: They sent a package to a prisoner here who may have been the first victim of the contagion.

speaker: MULDER
line: Any idea what was in the package?

speaker: SCULLY
line: No, it's empty.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, from the description we got, one of the prisoners had a large, purple-ish inflammation on his face.

speaker: SCULLY
line: That sounds like what I'm finding on all the victims in here. Do you know what that means, Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah, it could spread. I, I, I need to know more about it. How it's transmitted.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm on it.

speaker: STEVE
line: Got to go. Got to keep moving.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: Paul... Paul, he's awake. Paul, come here.

speaker: STEVE
line: You got to help me. I, I'm, I'm burning up here. Please, I'm...

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: Ahh! Paul! Ahh! Oh! Paul! Paul! Paul!

speaker: MULDER
line: We've got one dead prisoner in the bedroom. The other one's gone.

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Come with me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why? What's going on?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Just come with me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What the hell is going on?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: I've been infected and they're not letting me out. The entire prison's been quarantined.

speaker: SCULLY
line: By who, the C.D.C.?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: The C.D.C. has nothing to do with this. It's the company. They're behind everything.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Pinck Pharmaceuticals. You work for Pinck Pharmaceuticals? How did this happen?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: We finance exploration of new species from the rain forest with potential drug applications. Three months ago, a field entomologist disappeared in Costa Rica.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Disappeared how?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: We're not sure. He just sent us some samples of an insect.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Like this? I found this buried in one of the dead prisoners.

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Faciphaga Emasculata. We were interested in it because of the dilating enzyme it secretes.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Is this what caused the outbreak?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: No, no, not precisely. The F. Emasculata is a parasitoid, a bug that carries a parasite. In this case, a deadly parasite that attacks the immune system. The pustules are part of the natural reproductive cycle. They're full of the larvae that you see there in the scope.

speaker: SCULLY
line: So the contagion only spreads when the pustules erupt and the larvae that are expelled burrow into the new host.

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Agent Scully... you were there when the pustule erupted on me... which means you may also be infected.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Come in.

speaker: MULDER
line: Thank you for seeing me at this late hour, sir.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What is it, Agent Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: This case we've been assigned, I believe we've been misled, possibly decieved.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Decieved? By whom?

speaker: MULDER
line: Whoever originated the case.

speaker: CSM
line: What is the accusation, Agent Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: That Agent Scully and I were sent on this manhunt without knowledge of the existence or nature of a contagion.

speaker: CSM
line: What is the exact nature of the contagion?

speaker: MULDER
line: It's deadly. It kills within thirty-six hours. One escaped convict was infected. He's dead now. The other man may be infected and he's on the loose.

speaker: CSM
line: Does anyone know how it's communicated, whether it's a virus or bacteria?

speaker: MULDER
line: No, we just know that over a dozen men have died from it and it appears to be highly contagious.

speaker: CSM
line: Then you don't know much, Agent Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why weren't we told the truth?

speaker: CSM
line: We didn't know the truth. What we knew would only have slowed you down.

speaker: MULDER
line: But innocent people could be infected! What you knew could have prevented that.

speaker: CSM
line: How? In 1988, there was an outbreak of hemmoragic fever in Sacramento, California. The truth would have caused panic. Panic would have cost lives. We controlled the disease by controlling the information.

speaker: MULDER
line: You can't protect the public by lying to them.

speaker: CSM
line: It's done every day.

speaker: MULDER
line: I won't be a party to it. How about you?

speaker: CSM
line: You're a party to it already. How many people are being infected while you stand here, not doing your job? Ten? Twenty? What's the truth, Agent Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: Mulder.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, they're enforcing a full quarantine.

speaker: MULDER
line: What?

speaker: SCULLY
line: One of the epidimiologists who claimed to be with the C.D.C. told me that this was no accident. Pinck Pharmaceuticals is here trying to clean it up quietly......and the government would have to know about it.

speaker: MULDER
line: Do you have proof of that?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why else would the national guard be here? They're protecting Pinck Pharmacuetical.

speaker: MULDER
line: Okay, listen, Scully. I need to know how this happened. I want you to start documenting everything you can get your hands on. People have to know about the cover-up.

speaker: SCULLY
line: The public?

speaker: MULDER
line: It's a public health crisis.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, we can't leak this, not until we know more. The fugitive that you're looking for... He might not even be infected.

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah, but what if he is?

speaker: SCULLY
line: If this gets out......prematurely, the panic is going to spread faster than the contagion. Mulder, we can't let this be known.

speaker: MULDER
line: What if someone dies because we witheld what we knew?

speaker: SCULLY
line: What if someone dies because we didn't? There'll be a time for the truth, Mulder, but this isn't it.

speaker: MULDER
line: Are you okay in there, Scully?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah. I'm okay. All I want you to worry about is capturing that fugitive. Take care of yourself, Mulder.

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: If you're not infected, you should leave immediately.

speaker: SCULLY
line: And if I am?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: The parasite is undetectable in the bloodstream. This is the only way to test whether or not you've been infected. These uninfected insects act as incubators. Now, the insect's bite won't infect you. The contagion can only be contracted through exposure to the larvae.

speaker: SCULLY
line: How long will this take?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Thirty minutes... and another two hours before the parasite reproduces enough for us to see it.

speaker: MULDER
line: Elizabeth? My name is Fox Mulder, I'm with the F.B.I. Where did Paul go, Elizabeth?

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: I don't know.

speaker: MULDER
line: I think you do know. And I think you know why you're in here. How are you feeling?

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: I'm fine.

speaker: MULDER
line: Steve felt fine too. Didn't take long for that to change.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: You're just trying to scare me.

speaker: MULDER
line: You should be scared. If I were you, I'd be scared.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: You're lying!

speaker: MULDER
line: No, Paul is the one who is lying and if he's infected, a lot of people are going to die.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: If that's true, how come it's not on TV? How come they're not telling everybody?

speaker: MULDER
line: That's not my decision.

speaker: ELIZABETH
line: Well, whose decision is it? You knew about it and you didn't say anything! Why should I tell the truth if you won't?

speaker: MULDER
line: Elizabeth, Paul is out there somewhere. I have to find him. Now, you can help me... or not. He's on a ten o'clock bus to Toronto, she was supposed to be with him.

speaker: TAPIA
line: That bus depot's over a half-hour from here, even doing ninety. Get on that phone with the local P.D., I want every man they've got!

speaker: MULDER
line: No! No, they don't know what they're dealing with. If he's infected, he could spread it. What we need know is control.

speaker: WOMAN
line: Toronto, one way?

speaker: PAUL
line: Yes.

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Now, once we harvest the blood from the insect...

speaker: SCULLY
line: What?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: The toxins... they're moving into my brain just like it did on the prisoners. I don't have much longer. I need you to help me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What do you want me to do?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: Go on. You have to complete the test.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why did you confide in me?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: It's not a secret I feel like taking to the grave. People have a right to know the danger we've put them in. If your test comes back negative... you have to tell them.

speaker: SCULLY
line: How can I prove it?

speaker: OSBOURNE
line: I don't know. But if you don't... it'll just happen again. Don't believe for a second... that this is an isolated incident.

speaker: ANNOUNCER
line: Attention please, bus number nine...

speaker: MOTHER
line: Will you wait a second?

speaker: BOY
line: I don't want to miss the bus.

speaker: MOTHER
line: You see that? They're still loading the luggage, you're not missing anything. You have enough time to give your mother a kiss goodbye.

speaker: BOY
line: Hey!

speaker: PAUL
line: What's the time?

speaker: BOY
line: Twenty to ten.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What are you doing?

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: This material has been confiscated and will be destroyed according to standard C.D.C. procedure.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You don't work for the C.D.C. Where's Doctor Osbourne? He told me what happened here.

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: What happened here was unavoidable.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, we'll leave that up to others to decide.

speaker: SIMON AUERBACH
line: Doctor Osbourne is dead. No one in this room will corroborate your story. Just be glad this thing's under control.

speaker: MULDER
line: He's here. He bought a ticket to Toronto.

speaker: TAPIA
line: Son of a bitch.

speaker: MULDER
line: And he's infected.

speaker: MULDER
line: Mulder.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder... I think everything here is under control.

speaker: MULDER
line: You okay, Scully?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah. Have you found the second prisoner?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah, he's headed to Toronto.

speaker: SCULLY
line: He's alive? Mulder, listen to me. Everything here has been destroyed. Any evidence whatsoever of a cover-up has been incinerated. That prisoner is the last man who can possibly connect the conspirators.

speaker: MULDER
line: But he's infected. He's going to die.

speaker: SCULLY
line: If you want the truth, Mulder, he's going to have to make a statement.

speaker: MULDER
line: Hold your men back.

speaker: TAPIA
line: What?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm getting on the bus.

speaker: TAPIA
line: We've got the situation controlled. That bus isn't going anywhere.

speaker: MULDER
line: There are other passangers on board. The prisoner sees a uniform, he could panic. He panics and innocent people die.

speaker: TAPIA
line: What do you want to do?

speaker: MULDER
line: I get on the bus, I take the seat directly behind the prisoner, I put my gun to his head, I make an announcement to clear the bus.

speaker: BUS DRIVER
line: Thank you. Can you take your seat, sir?

speaker: MULDER
line: There's supposed to be a man on the bus.

speaker: BUS DRIVER
line: Sir, I've got a schedule to keep. Now, please, take your seat or I'm going to have to ask you to get off.

speaker: MULDER
line: Take the key out of the ignition and turn around slowly.

speaker: BUS DRIVER
line: What is this?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm with the F.B.I. I need to know if this man has boarded the bus.

speaker: BUS DRIVER
line: Yeah. That's him. Right back there.

speaker: MULDER
line: Federal agent! Drop your weapon!

speaker: TAPIA
line: Plan A has gone to hell. Get ready to move, people.

speaker: MULDER
line: Let the boy go!

speaker: PAUL
line: Move the damn bus!

speaker: MULDER
line: You got over two dozen U.S. marshalls out there, Paul. How far you gonna get?

speaker: PAUL
line: I'm dying, ain't I?

speaker: MULDER
line: The question is, how many people are you going to take with you?

speaker: PAUL
line: What is this thing?

speaker: MULDER
line: You were infected in prison.

speaker: PAUL
line: It's what Bobby Torrence had.

speaker: MULDER
line: And your girlfriend Elizabeth and possibly your son. How many more people do you want to expose?

speaker: PAUL
line: It came from that package in Bobby's cell, didn't it?

speaker: MULDER
line: You saw a package?

speaker: PAUL
line: What the hell was it?

speaker: MULDER
line: All right, everybody, off the bus. Just keep going. Just go. Keep moving! All right, come on out. It's okay. Come on out, just slide out. I'm here for you. That's it. All right. All right, Paul, what was in that package? What was in that package? A pharmaceutical company was using you as a guinea pig! If you tell me what was in that package, I'll make sure they don't get away with it! Come on, Paul, you remember. Tell me!

speaker: PAUL
line: It... it...

speaker: MAN #1
line: Get out of there!

speaker: MAN #2
line: Keep your distance!

speaker: MAN #1
line: You have to get off, let's go! Get off!

speaker: MULDER
line: Robert Torrence was patient zero, the first prisoner to contract the disease. Just before being admitted to the infirmary, he received a package from Pinck Pharmaceuticals. They orchestrated this entire thing to circumvent years of F.D.A. trials in order to get their drug on the market.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Why are you telling me this, Agent Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: Because I wanted you to hear it from me before you read it in the papers.

speaker: SKINNER
line: I'd seriously reconsider bringing this to the media if that's your intention.

speaker: MULDER
line: The public has a right to know so it doesn't happen again.

speaker: SKINNER
line: And you're going to prove this elaborate conspiracy with a, an empty package and a dead insect? Leave it alone, Agent Mulder. The epidemic was contained.

speaker: MULDER
line: Eighteen people are dead, and if you're helping them cover the truth behind those deaths, then you're just as guilty as they are.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You really have no idea who you're dealing with, do you?

speaker: MULDER
line: I thought I was dealing with you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We can't prove a thing, Mulder. They've made sure of it.

speaker: MULDER
line: What are you talking about?

speaker: SCULLY
line: The Costa Rican government just faxed me the report on the missing scientist. His name is Robert Torrence, the same as our prisoner. It was their failsafe in case it ever came to this so they could blame it on a simple postal error. A mistake.

speaker: MULDER
line: That's why we were given this assignment, right? They knew all along... so that even if we succeeded in finding the truth, we'd be discredited as part of it. Am I right? Am I right?!

speaker: SKINNER
line: You never had a chance, Agent Mulder. For every step you take, they're three steps ahead.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, what about you, where do you stand?

speaker: SKINNER
line: I stand right on the line that you keep crossing.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Come on, let's go.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Mulder. I'm saying this as a friend. Watch your back. This is just the beginning.
